marytts.util.data.text
Class PraatIntervalTier

java.lang.Object
  marytts.util.data.text.PraatIntervalTier
All Implemented Interfaces:
PraatTier
public class PraatIntervalTier
extends java.lang.Object
implements PraatTier

Representation of an IntervalTier in a Praat TextGrid. Contains a number of intervals, which should not overlap or contain gaps.

Author:
steiner
